name: Ash Ketchum
smallSnopsies: Ash Ketchum is the main character of the Pokémon anime. He is also the main character of various manga based on the anime, including The Electric Tale of Pikachu, Ash & Pikachu, and Pocket Monsters Diamond & Pearl.
bigSnopsies: Ash Ketchum is a Pokémon Trainer from Pallet Town whose goal is to become a Pokémon Master. He is the main protagonist of I Choose You! and its sequel, Pokémon Journeys: The Series. He is also the main character of various manga based on the anime, including The Electric Tale of Pikachu, Ash & Pikachu, and Pocket Monsters Diamond & Pearl. Ash's dream is to become a Pokémon Master. He is always accompanied by his partner and best friend Pikachu.
